name: Adrienne's NYC
address: 25 Van Brunt Rd, Queens, NY 11693, USA

reviews.text: Enjoyed a wonderful lunch for 4. Jack made delicious cocktails.Nancy was our server. She was friendly, accommodating and attentive. The food was spectacular. Everything was cooked perfectly. The ambience and vibe is beautiful and relaxing. Adrienne‚Äôs is a real gem.
Ocean conditions were perfect for our first time cruise to this waterfront restaurant last weekend. We could not have had a better experience! Can hardly wait for next season; well worth the trip!!

We celebrated our daughter‚Äôs 16th birthday just over a week ago at Adrienne‚Äôs. Everything turned out perfect and we cannot thank the staff at Adrienne‚Äôs enough! Everyone we dealt with including Chris, Megan, Nancy and Michael, were so helpful and made sure the night went smoothly. The loft area upstairs was perfect for our group of about 20 guests. And now to the best part‚Ä¶the food. Everything we had from the salad to the dessert was absolutely delicious! The arancini, Chef A‚Äôs rigatoni, skirt steak and everything else was incredible. Truly. Everyone loved it! So thank you again to everyone at Adrienne‚Äôs for making the night unforgettable. You are definitely on our restaurant rotation now.

My daughter and son in law recently celebrated their wedding here. It was absolutely beautiful. The restaurant was closed to the public for this so we were able to utilize the entire space. From the staff to the food everything was amazing.  I can‚Äôt say enough about the staff and the owners . They were so accommodating and no detail was overlooked. Lina definitely was an all star . We were blessed with great weather and able to be inside and out. I highly recommend this restaurant for any occasion.
Good food

Food is good but inconsistent in quality each time we‚Äôve gone. The server was great, very nice and attentive. The host seating needs major improvement. We were told we couldn‚Äôt have a table in the atrium despite SEVERAL empty tables because it was all ‚Äúreserved‚Äù even after asking again. For one and a half hours all those tables remained empty while we sat isolated in a hot boring corner. Towards the end of our meal, we saw a couple being told the same thing but when they pressed again, the host sat them in the atrium. I have not felt this level of disappointment in a long time especially because we were the only racially different people there. When we complained, the host had an attitude while she went to get the manager. The manager was kind but this experience has left a sour taste.

TLDR: I enjoyed the appetizers [calamari + burrata garlic toast] and my "specials" entree [pink snapper]. But other entrees [veal milanese, oxtail agnolotti] were wayyyy too salty! Loved the atmosphere and service tho!

My party and I all thoroughly enjoyed the appetizers. I think the burrata garlic bread was the highlight of the night. The garlic butter on the bread was heavy on the salt, but it was kinda balanced out by the burrata... so im not that mad about it. The calamari was $21 which i honestly thought the portion size was quite small for that price. It was good regardless.

I got the special of the night, Pink Snapper, which was on top of a creamy veggie medley [peas, leeks, peppers... + other stuff]. This was so yummy! Loved the balance between the pan fried fish and the creamy sauce. My boyfriend got the Veal Milanese which was SOOOOOO SALTY. The arugula salad was crunchy due to the crazy amount of salt on top. Originally thought the arugula had parmesean on top........ which was incorrect. All salt. I thought the veal was also extremely dry and under seasoned, but my boyfriend enjoyed it. Our friend ordered the Oxtail Agnolotti which he enjoyed the Oxtail, but again the sauce was too salty.

Ultimately, I enjoyed my dinner but please just go lighter on the salt!
Reduce salt content in the food like 40% and you‚Äôre good bro, trust.
Good food

The food is nice, but the highlight is the lovely view of the bay and ocean. Perfect plan: head to the beach, then unwind on the terrace with a great meal and drinks. The setting is relaxed, scenic, and a great escape out of NYC.
Reservations recommended if the day is sunny and you want to get the tables right in front of the bay.

I was there for a Bridal shower. It was absolutely beautiful and the food was unbelievably delicious. Super cool location, right on the water. Pay attention driving up though because I accidentally was on the whole wrong side of the road.

Went for brunch. The brunch menu was enticing and all the items we ordered were delicious! Especially loved the chopped salad and the frittata. Love that they have a rocket fuel iced coffee on the menu! Never see that anywhere. Plus, the water views, decor, and the spacious layout enhance the experience.
My friends and I all thought the food was absolutely delicious and the service was impeccable. Looking forward to coming back again soon
Great atmosphere and oysters!
Love this place!! Beautiful view on the water and the food is incredible. A ton of fun dishes and great drinks (Lost in Calabria cocktail!), consistent and doesn't disappoint.
Food and service was outstanding, definitely coming back to get to try other stuff in the menu. Kudos to the chef and servers
"We were a party of 11 and everyone enjoyed their time together there and the food. They all want to go back. One guest said she wanted to go back for her birthday. Amazing place. "
This is a great restaurant in venue nice selection
Best restaurant ever; go and find out for yourself!!!!!!!
Everything is delicious!!! I‚Äôve been here a few times and it just keeps getting better!! Definitely one of the best places around.
This is a gem of a spot in Queens. The food, the ambiance and the staff are all world class. I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone that ask.

This place was absolutely amazing delicious food GREAT service by our waitress Liz she was in the money I definitely recommend that if you‚Äôre looking for a great place to take your family this is the spot. Will be definitely going back in‚Ä¶

Fantastic food! Personable, warm and welcoming service from Liz. We had 5 apps and 4 entrees and they were all really good. Desserts were a 10/10. Just an absolutely great time. Yesterday we had dinner at a VERY famous Italian spot in the city and it wasn‚Äôt anywhere nearly as good as Adrienne‚Äôs!
Will definitely return!
Had an amazing experience. Friendly service, great atmosphere and most of all phenomenal food. There wasnt one thing we didnt like. Can't wait to come back

First got there at 6:07 and they offered me mAnGos so I said MUSTARD and the mango said 67 mustard mango milkshake is the best so that is what I ordered. Next thing you know the chef screamed 67!!!!!! The 67 mustard mango milkshake is the best. Definitely would rate it a 6.7/ 5 if I could.

Absolute perfection!! We recently had a large family dinner here and it was beyond amazing, the service, the food, the atmosphere, and did I mention THE FOOD, omg it was one of the best meals of my life and numerous family members came up to me to say the same as well. They also accomodated for gluten allergies and other special seating requests as well.  So happy we decided to book with them, it was truly a special and memorable night!
Great view, Excellent service, great bar, ok food.
A hidden gem in queens.Wonderful food and service.

We had the best time celebrating our 27th wedding anniversary.   Lisa, our server and Isabella (Izzy) her assistant took excellent care of us.  The food was outstanding,  the ambience lovely.  We can't wait to come back!
A great place to celebrate a special occasion!!!üç∑üç∑üëç

Fresh baked focaccia, amazing grilled octopus and fried calamari and perfectly crisp arancini got our meal started and none of it disappointed! The pastas, hanger steak and desserts were all killer. We will be returning very soon!!

Newer trendy younger crowd place with docking for you boat. Fancy drinks,  and in-house made pasta,  which was not cooked enough ( very undercooked).  A birthday present from my kids,  but it's a  one and done for me.

This is by far and away my favorite restaurant. I have tried so many regular dishes and specials and everything is SO delicious that it‚Äôs hard to pick a favorite. All of the pastas are made fresh daily and the mixture of flavors in the dishes are out of this world. The skirt steak is the best I‚Äôve ever had and same thing with the signature Bolognese dish. The Calamari and Octopus dishes are not to be missed. And the Burrata appetizer and the Ricotta bread appetizer are both phenomenal.  Every desert is off the charts and you can tell that all of the specialty drink are made with high quality ingredients. The bartender Christine is the BEST and the entire staff and owners are exceptional and always go above and beyond to make you feel welcomed. And then you have the beautiful water views and sunsets with the addition of live music for the perfect atmosphere.  It just doesn‚Äôt get any better than Adrienne‚Äôs!!!

"This is now our Grandparents from Breezy's favorite restaurant in the Rockaways. Despite us being 40 minutes late for the reservation due to a deflationary dingy, the servers and restaurant was understanding and lovely. Chicken and pasts dishes delish. Also - docks fantastic if you come by boat. Thank you. xross"

The food was delicious and the service was great!  The staff is warm and welcoming.
I've been here several times and have loved it each time.
Great food, cocktails, service and the water views from the deck are priceless.
Impeccable service and even better food.. Ambience was beautiful and great entertainment. We will definitely return with family and friends indefinitely..

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

Adrienne‚Äôs in Broad Channel is a gem! The food was outstanding‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and made with real care‚Äîbut what truly set this place apart was the management. We had a friend flying in from out of town and, due to some last-minute logistical issues, had to change our reservation time. On a busy summer Friday when every table was booked, they still found a way to make it work for us. Their flexibility and hospitality turned what could have been a stressful night into a memorable one. It‚Äôs rare to find a place that values both great food and genuine service at this level. Can‚Äôt recommend them enough!
"We really enjoyed sitting outside on a beautiful night. As always, food was top notch! Service was also great as always!"
Food was delicious and our server made wonderful recommendations. Adrienne‚Äôs never disappoints!!

Beautiful atmosphere and ambiance, nothing beats a water view. Service is excellent, Sophie is a gem, additional staff very accommodating and Leo who is one of the owners is super welcoming. Complimentary limoncello served by him is a classy act.
The food is scrumptious, and the portions are just right. Also my cocktail Come Fly With Me was on point.
We will definitely be coming back and bringing friends.

The ambiance was nice, the pasta and cocktails were good however we waited forever for our food to come out. Do you not offer bread with the meal? The steak was very tough and the clam pasta dish was cold. Also why do you put a giant disk of butter on top of the steak. ? And the potatoes were hard. The rigatoni and Calamari were good. Initially took our waitress a long time to come over. For these prices your dinner experience should be impeccable. Will not return.

Adrienne‚Äôs is the BEST restaurant around by far -  I even prefer it over many great dining spots in Manhattan. Atmosphere‚Ä¶ service‚Ä¶ food‚Ä¶ cocktails‚Ä¶ I truly cannot say enough good things.
The bar tenders are consistently excellent (especially Christine inside and Chris M. outside).
The oysters are the best I‚Äôve ever had and they rotate the selection practically everyday (ask for their house-made hot sauce with them for an added bonus).
Can‚Äôt go wrong with any dish on the food menu.
This place knows how to handle a crowd with ease!!! Always best vibes here.

I celebrated my birthday in this restaurant and I don't have enough words to describe how special it was. Since we arrived, the warm and elegant atmosphere enveloped us. Every corner had that perfect touch between the cozy and the sophisticated, ideal for such a meaningful night.

The service was impeccable: attentive, friendly and always with a smile. They made us feel at home, but with all the luxuries of a five-star experience. The food... a total delight! Each dish was prepared with so much care and flavor that you could see the love in the kitchen.

The owners of the restaurant great people and a 10/10 staff.

My guests and I were delighted. It was a night full of laughter, beautiful tears and moments that will remain forever in my heart. Thank you for being part of a birthday that I will never forget.

Without a doubt, I will return a thousand times more.

The only thing they need... is to open more places. üòÜ

üå∏ With love,

Dylean.

What a hidden gem! After a sunny afternoon at the Rockaways, we were craving a chilled drink by the water and initially headed to Bungalow Bar‚Äîbut with no parking in sight, we started driving away and stumbled upon Adrienne‚Äôs on Broad Channel Island. I‚Äôm so glad we did.

Adrienne‚Äôs is a charming waterfront Italian restaurant with a lovely breeze, relaxed atmosphere, and live music (we caught a guy singing covers on guitar‚Äîsuch a nice touch). The menu is fantastic, and the standout for me was the lobster agnolotti. It came in a saffron and cultured butter broth that was absolute heaven‚Äînot too salty, perfectly balanced, and I‚Äôm pretty sure the pasta is made in-house.

It‚Äôs the perfect spot to wind down after the beach. Cozy, unpretentious, and delicious. Definitely adding Adrienne‚Äôs to my Queens restaurants rotation.

I had my bridal shower at Adrienne‚Äôs and was very happy I did. I got a ton of compliments on the day from our guests thanks to the great food, ambiance , drinks and service. Thank you to Chris Keegan for all your help!

Came here to celebrate my mom‚Äôs birthday and we had the best time ever. The service was incredible. Everything we ordered was tasty ( which is rare) and the vibes were incredible. Will definitely come back.

Adrienne‚Äôs has an incredible environment. The live music and or DJ‚Äôs always cater to the crowd. The cocktails are great and the food is spectacular. The staff is very inviting and make sure your experience is special. I  recommend all dishes but the porterhouse is outstanding as well as all the seafood. Always consider the specials too, some of them have been incredible.
We did t have a reservation but were able to grab a spot at the bar. The staff was very friendly and the food was good. We got two of the days specials and were very happy with our choices.

We threw a 50th wedding anniversary dinner together for my in-laws and everything turned out great. We booked the loft area and it was the perfect space for our 20 person party. We enjoyed the cocktails and the food. Portions were really big and everyone was able to take home leftovers. It was great that we had the space for the evening, so we were not rushed.

We really enjoyed all of the food. Rigatoni and the roasted chicken were my favorites.

There was a DJ downstairs, the music was fun, a little loud, but nice to have fun music playing in the background. Our waitress, I think her name is Liz, was very attentive and great about our drink orders. Rocco was also a rock star, they both made our party fun. Thank you them!

I would definitely recommend Adrienne‚Äôs for parties!

Absolutely amazing experience! Came in for my niece‚Äôs birthday brunch, a big group. Food was scrumptious, cocktails were perfectly mixed, service - quick and friendly, and you get great water (channel) views from the atrium. We‚Äôll definitely be back when it warms up to take advantage of the outdoor area.
Great service, food, and an incredible vibe. Maybe slightly overpriced but I still recommend and would go back. Huge parking lot too!

We hosted a private event for my birthday and everything was so perfect. We had the loft room which was beautiful for 16 guests. Was perfect to watch the sunset, and live music was downstairs which was nice touch to our party. They catered to our every need, and even accommodated our guests who had food restrictions. Everyone raved about the food and cannot wait till I can host another party at this amazing place. Thank you to Chris and our server Laura for going above and beyond. Wish you all nothing but success. Adrienne‚Äôs is the best!

From the moment we walked in we felt a warm welcome from the hostess, they were busy and my wife and I didn‚Äôt have a reservation but Leo came over and was able to accommodate us with a great table on the deck outside. He‚Äôs an absolute gentleman.

We got the charred octopus which was out of this world! such a balance of flavors on that plate. Be sure to get some house made freshly baked bread because you‚Äôll want to sop up every last drop of juice

My wife got the spaghetti with clams. The pasta was so amazing and hand made in house daily. The quality of this pasta was like when my nonna and family in Sicily make fresh pasta.

I got the Veal Milanese. Crispy and fried to perfection but still soft and tender on the inside. One of the best plates of food I had in a while.

Get the banana pudding for dessert and thank me later.

Besides the food being absolutely delicious,  our waitress Annette was great and the young buss boys also. The  atmosphere and our experience over all is something we will definitely be back for. They make you feel like family in this place.

Great food, great people, great service. A must try !

Adrienne‚Äôs is an absolute gem for modern Italian cuisine lovers. It combines a great atmosphere, exceptional service, and delicious food in a way that feels both elevated and welcoming.

From the first step in, you‚Äôre met with warm hospitality and a cozy ambiance that makes you want to stay a little longer. The staff is attentive and genuinely cares about your experience.

The food? Simply put ‚Äî amazing. Classic Italian dishes with bold flavors, fresh ingredients, and generous portions. Perfect for a weekend dinner or a relaxing meal after a beach day.

25 minutes from JFK airport and so worth the visit. Some people were here for a layover, we were just here for the night & wish we could have come back for seconds. Great service, great drinks and amazing food‚Äî5 outta 5 stars for me ü§é

There‚Äôs not enough good things to say about Adrienne‚Äôs!!   The atmosphere is amazing! The restaurant is beautiful and there is not a bad seat in the house.  You can sit indoors or be seated outside on the big deck on the water.  You are shaded by big beautiful orange and white striped umbrellas that make you feel like you are on vacation.  The service is great.  Everyone working there seems like they enjoy their job.  I‚Äôve also loved everything I‚Äôve eaten there, whether it be seafood or the pasta bolognese.  Desserts and drinks are also exceptional.  I would very strongly recommend dining there.  Overall, it‚Äôs a great experience.  I didn‚Äôt know Adrienne but I‚Äôm sure she would be proud!

The food and drinks are always so good
We Always have the best night
Their bartenders are the best and their cocktails are top notch
The owners are so invested in their customers having a great night
There‚Äôs no other place like it on the peninsula
Every thing at Adrienne‚Äôs is carefully planned out and done with love
We‚Äôre lucky to have such a great place to go
Have another you maniacs  ‚ù§Ô∏è

Went to celebrate our anniversary and had a wonderful dinner! The food, the view, the atmosphere, the live music and the service was ALL great!
Everyone on staff was polite & professional-especially our server Lauren!
Make sure you order the octopus-it‚Äôs super tender!
Cocktails are delicious & balanced.
Steak was perfectly cooked, sides were delicious, and desserts were the perfect end to a special evening.

My family and I have been regulars at Adrienne's since it opened this summer 2023. The abundance of boat slips at this restaurant makes it perfect for our boating family. Plus, my husband is a local from Broad Channel, so we love supporting local businesses.

Recently, we celebrated my husband's and daughter's birthday together (yes, they share the same birthday!) by booking Adrienne's private loft space. We had a party of 20 adults, along with a few babies and toddlers. The loft space is beautifully designed and offers a stunning view of Jamaica Bay.

From start to finish, our experience was delightful. Chris K. owner/manager was quick to respond to my inquiries and very accommodating during the planning process. On the day of the event, the service was exceptional. The food surpassed our expectations, with generous family-style portions. I couldn't get enough of the delicious bread service, especially the olive oil dip. The Poseidon raw bar and the skirt steak were absolute hits!

Overall, it was a memorable event, and I enthusiastically recommend Adrienne's restaurant as a whole, but especially their private loft space for any special occasion.
Everything was amazing.  Everyone was very nice and accommodating.   Justin, Rocco and Jaxson were especially attentive to our table and kept it perfect!!

We had expected a mom and pop restaurant and were highly surprised and thrilled by an amazing atmosphere and dining experience right on the water. Food was beyond words..service incredible and, my goodness we thought Frank Sinatra was deceased ‚Ä¶but his voice channelled on in the live entertainment. We also asked an owner about Adrienne and were amazed by the story and the heartfelt emotion‚Ä¶don‚Äôt come here often because we don‚Äôt live here..definitely a return spot!! A destination! Love this place!!

I have never experienced hospitality and service to this level. Leo, one of the owners was so kind and made my moms birthday so wonderful! Our waitress was so warm and friendly, definitely recommend for the live music and delicious food! Looking forward to the leftovers :)

We had a great experience for my wife's birthday. The food and service were top notch and the views were spectacular. There was also live music which was a special touch. I recommend everyone come here for this special experience. The owner Leo also came and gave me a great history on how the restaurant got started it was a nice story I wish them lots of success in their future endeavors.

Skip the plane ride, once you walk in you feel like you are on vacation. Place is beautiful, big open bar, awesome view, plenty of room to walk around. The seafood is incredible, oysters are delicious. Pasta dishes are made with love. Overall a great experience, staff is on the money. Gabby was our waitress, and she was incredible, one step ahead of us we never had to ask for anything. Highly recommend.

Where do I start, I‚Äôm lucky to have Adrienne‚Äôs so close by! Everything is wonderful. The food, atmosphere just everything is fantastic! The burrata and the ricotta toast appetizers are a few of my favorites. The gnocchi is probably my favorite entree! The chocolate cake is probably my favorite dessert too! It‚Äôs a great spot for this little town. It‚Äôs on the water and has live music each night. It‚Äôs a perfect spot for a night out! We sat at the bar and enjoyed everything. The staff at the restaurant were extremely helpful too, shout out to Ashley, Jack and Christine. When you walk into this restaurant, you aren‚Äôt going to be considered a customer. You will be treated like a friend. At the end of your meal you will leave full and extremely happy. It‚Äôs the best place to have a good time. Especially when you‚Äôre around people that care about you a lot. I say it all the time when I‚Äôm there.

Amazing! I went with my boyfriend as an early Father‚Äôs Day outing. The menu was initially hard to read through but our server was able to explain the portion size as well as what‚Äôs provided in the dish. Great drinks and food recommendations! Left overs were definitely taken. Highly recommended and a cozy feel by the water. Great date night and celebration area 10/10. 2 people with apps, dinner, dessert and drinks came out to a little less than 200. So worth it!
What a beautiful restaurant! Friendly staff, clean establishment, delicious food, and fantastic drinks! Definitely recommend and continue to dine there!

The food, the atmosphere, the service at Adrienne‚Äôs are all 5 STAR! To top it all off, the way the staff treats the customers is beyond terrific!! I dine out a lot and I have never been to a restaurant that not only has great food, but that also has such an accommodating, friendly, fun staff. It is so obvious that the ‚Äúcustomer‚Äù at Adrienne‚Äôs is the most important thing to everyone who works there. You all do it right on every level! - Katie

Adrienne‚Äôs was the perfect spot for our family brunch celebration on a Sunday. The private upstairs room comfortably accommodated our group of 24 and offered a beautiful view of the water. My guests were impressed not only by the setting but also by the delicious food and desserts. The service was excellent‚Äîstaff were attentive to everyone‚Äôs needs. The live music was a wonderful addition and made the day even more special. Everyone had a fantastic time.
We also love coming on Friday nights for the DJ. Whether with new or old friends, Adrienne‚Äôs is always a great place to gather and have a good time. The menu changes, so there‚Äôs always something new to try, both in food and drinks, which keeps each visit exciting!

My favorite seafood place.
The food is delicious, the atmosphere is warm and friendly.
And awesome view.
